name: history_prices
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool macrotrends_finance.
Tool description: Stocks API helps to query for the Financials Statement/Sheet that has over 10 years of finacial data.
API description: This gives you the Date, Open, High, Low, Close, Adj Close, Volume prices of the stock

QUERY PARAMETER: symbol the ticker symbol of the company you want to see.

QUERY PARAMETER: range = ['1y', '5y', 'max']

range.description: The time period for which to fetch stock prices. Choices are ['1y', '5y', 'max']. Defaults to '1y'.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the company. Defaults to 'TSLA'.
